text: Wang Tingdong () (1923 – December 21, 2010) was a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Pingding County, Shanxi. He was a delegate to the 7th National People's Congress and 8th National People's Congress.原省人大主任王庭栋在高平市调研 ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Delegates to the 7th National People's Congress Category:Delegates to the 8th National People's Congress Category:Politicians from Yangquan
title: Wang Tingdong
